PromotionPartyUsageDetail.name: PromotionPartyUsageDetail
PromotionPartyUsageDetail.description: Represents the amount that's discounted by a promotion for a transaction journal.

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with the organization that has used the promotion.

ContactId.description: ID of the contact associated with the person who has used the promotion.

DiscountAmount.description: The monetary discount provided to the person or organization who has availed the promotion.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: ID of the loyalty program member who has used the promotion.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

PartyId.description: ID of the person or the organization that has been provided the discount.

PartyType.description: The type of customer that has been provided the discount.

PromotionId.description: Required. The promotion that has provided the discount to the customer.

TransactionJournalId.description: ID of the transaction journal that represents the customer activity for which the promotion has been applied.
